org.drip.analytics.definition

Class ZeroCurve

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.service.stream.Serializer
      • org.drip.analytics.definition.DiscountCurve
        • org.drip.analytics.definition.ZeroCurve
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Curve
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DerivedZeroCurve

    public abstract class ZeroCurve
extends DiscountCurve
    This class contains the baseline abstract zero curve holder object. In addition to the discount functionality, it provides the functionality to calculate the zero rate.

        public abstract double getZeroRate(double dblDate)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Retrieves the zero rate corresponding to the given date
        Parameters:
        dblDate - Date for which the zero rate is requested
        Returns:
        Zero Rate
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if the date is not represented in the map
